scene_description_enriched: A woman with long, wavy hair and a distinctive headdress, possibly a hennin or a similar conical hat, is depicted in profile. Her hands are clasped together in front of her chest, suggesting prayer or devotion. She is positioned next to a column with decorative elements. Behind her, a patterned background, possibly representing a tapestry or a decorative wall, is visible, framed by an arched architectural element. The scene appears to be set within an architectural context, possibly a domestic or religious interior.
